channel.title: Configuration on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on Syniti Documentation

item.title: Set Up Security for Common
item.description: Set Up Security for Common To set up security: Create User Accounts in Common Create Security Roles (performed by an Administrator) Assign a User to a Security Role in Common Assign WebApp Groups to Security Role (performed by an Administrator) Establish User-Specific Security Definitions by adding the data source to be used in Common as a key to the Analyze DataSources description.(performed by an Administrator) NOTE: Once the keys are added, the data sources are listed under the Analyze menu to be traced, profiled, or scanned for duplicate data.

item.title: Setup and Configuration for Common
item.description: Setup and Configuration for Common Before getting started with Common, verify the following steps have been completed: Set up Security for Common Register a Data Source in Common
